text: A Copy of My Mind is a 2015 Indonesian South Korean drama movie directed by Joko Anwar and starring Tara Basro, Ario Bayu, Chicco Jerikho, Paul Agusta. == Plot == A young woman working at a low-cost beauty salon in Jakarta falls in love with a man who subtitles pirated DVDs. Their romance blossoms quickly, but as the country faces political turmoil during the presidential election, their love is testedâ€”because it's always the ordinary people who suffer most in unstable times. ==Other websites== * * Category:2015 drama movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:South Korean movies Category:Movies directed by Joko Anwar
title: A Copy of My Mind
